title: I, Coriander
description: In this exceptionally well-crafted tale, Coriander tells the story of her childhood in seventeenth-century Londonâ€”and of her discovery that she has inherited magical powers from her mother, who was a fairy princess. But her mother's sudden death brings on a dark time for Coriander. And after mourning her beloved mother and dealing with the disappearance of her father and the wrath of her evil stepmother, Coriander finds herself locked in a chest with no hope of escape and no will to survive. But when a bright light beckons to her, it is then that Coriander's journey truly begins.
author: Sally Gardner
